entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 12:12 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: WSW 33 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
